name: INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Verify rock source, size, and quality.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Rock to comply with AS2758.4 (Grading, density, and durabillity) and GWW specifications.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY - Material Test Certificates, Supplier documentation
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Check rock quality upon delivery.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - No signs of contamination, segregation, or damage; size within specified range.
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Inspect for compaction and grading.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Subgrade compacted to >95% MDD, Level within +/- 25mm of design, free from debris or soft spots.
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Verify installation, overlap, and anchoring
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Overlap >300mm, securely anchored, free from tears, and installed per approved design.
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Inspect placement and uniformity.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Rocks placed uniformly with no voids, ensuring interlocking; comply with specified grading.
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Check surface finish and grading.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Surface finish within +/- 50mm of specified elevation; proper interlocking achieved.
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Inspect additional stabilisation measures.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Installation of measures (e.g., concrete aprons or additional rock)per aprroved drawings.
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Measurre and verify surface levels and slopes.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Finished structure complies with design levels, gradients, and specified tolerances.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY - As built survey records, QA sign off
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Inspect for potential scouring or drainage issues.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Ensure effective drainage and no areas prone to erosion around the structure.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY - Final inspection report, photos
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Conduct visual and dimensional inspection.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Entire structure complies with GWW-approved drawings, specifications, and standard.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY - Final inspection records
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
